words.source: H1961: KJV 'And', ESV 'And', NASB 'Now' (wayhi as narrative conjunction introducing the event)
H4371: KJV 'LORD's tribute', ESV 'tribute to the Lord', NASB 'LORD's tribute' (hammeḵes as the levy or tax)
H3068: KJV 'the LORD's', ESV 'the Lord', NASB 'the LORD' (lə-YHWH, dative of YHWH)
H4480: KJV 'of', ESV 'from', NASB 'of' (min as partitive preposition)
H6629: KJV 'the sheep', ESV 'the sheep', NASB 'the sheep' (haṣṣōʾn as small cattle, sheep/goats)
H8337: KJV 'six', ESV 'six', NASB 'six' (šēš as cardinal number)
H3967: KJV 'hundred', ESV 'hundred', NASB 'hundred' (mēʾôt as hundreds, distributive)
H2568: KJV 'and five', ESV 'and five', NASB 'and five' (ḥāmēš as five)
H7657: KJV 'and threescore and fifteen' (total), ESV 'seventy-five', NASB 'seventy-five' (wəšiḇʿîm part of the total 675)
